posts.post_content:
At the rate Avacyn Restored spoilers are going....you know what this thing just might get another Reprint. As a Mythic, I would hope.   
  
Of course, that might be too much to hope for- but seriously, go check out [Gisela](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gisela), [Avacyn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Avacyn), and [Griselbrand](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Griselbrand) and you'll see why I think they almost could have. [Stoneforge Mystic](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stoneforge Mystic) would make sense after THOSE spoilers. xD  
  
[Kaalia of the Vast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kaalia of the Vast) is the Witch Queen of Innistrad.
